channel.title: Missing US Navy Chief Petty Officer [Updated] [7-15-13]
channel.description:
[center] [size=24pt][b]Still Missing as of 7/15/13[/b][/size]
Hello, I ask that you take a minute to look at this and pass it along to others via Facebook, Twitter, etc. I know this isn't the best place for something like this but everything helps.
http://abcnews.go.com/GMA/video/navy-recruiter-kevin-williams-vanishes-jacksonville-florida-mall-19363369
www.wokv.com/news/news/local/search-missing-navy-man/nX7Ls/
http://www.navycs.com/blogs/2013/06/02/a-chief-petty-officer-is-missing
http://abcnews.go.com/US/kevin-williams-florida-navy-officer-missing-12-days/story?id=19358910
http://www.digtriad.com/news/article/287846/1/Navy-Chief-Kevin-Williams-Missing-From-Jacksonville-FL-Since-May-28
http://foxnewsinsider.com/2013/06/10/kevin-williams-florida-navy-officer-missing-after-getting-fight-wife
http://www.news4jax.com/news/community-to-hold-vigil-for-missing-navy-chief/-/475880/20753834/-/10ska35z/-/index.html
[img]http://i.imgur.com/F699HKz.png[/img]
[b]Chief Petty Officer Kevin Williams, US Navy went missing at approximately 1420(2:20pm) on May 28th 2013. He was last seen by his wife at Avenues Mall in Jacksonville Florida. He was wearing the Navy Working Uniform (The blue digital camouflage seen in the picture). If you have any information please contact the police or NRD Jacksonville Command Duty Officer @ 904.524.3723[/b]
Bigger Image: http://i.imgur.com/l7BavpO.jpg
I created this image for easy sharing [img]http://img221.imageshack.us/img221/9683/lgtabbbm.png[/img]
To any of you who are Americans or live in the United States, kindly show some support for a man who has dedicated himself to serving you, and your country.
Everything helps, Thank-you.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/bByjINj.png[/img]

item.title: Missing US Navy Chief Petty Officer [Updated] [7-15-13]
item.dc:creator: @stewie0888 stewie0888
item.description:
@stewie0888 wrote:

I haven’t gotten any updates. As of this reply he is still missing.

Recently the story was picked up by Good Morning America, World News, and other national news stations.

The US Navy considers him AWOL (Absent Without Leave), I believe after 2 months they consider it Desertion. He’s a chief which is an E7 (Highest enlisted is Master chief, E9, besides warrant officers but I won’t get into that) which is a pretty high rank, and takes time and motivation so I wouldn’t think he would just leave that career.

Some Info Links:

ABC News

Navy Recruiter Missing for 12 Days

Authorities are trying to piece together where a respected Jacksonville, Fla. navy recruiter may have gone after he was reported missing 12 days ago.

http://www.digtriad.com/news/article/287846/1/Navy-Chief-Kevin-Williams-Missing-From-Jacksonville-FL-Since-May-28

http://foxnewsinsider.com/2013/06/10/kevin-williams-florida-navy-officer-missing-after-getting-fight-wife

WJXT – 29 Jun 13

Family, friends of missing sailor join for candlelight vigil

Friends and family of Chief Petty Officer Kevin Williams gathered during a candlelight vigil Friday in Mandarin.

Read full topic

item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:18, topic:520376”]When I search his name with title in google this thread is now the 2nd result for me.

That means other people who care about him could likely see this thread. I am deleting all the arguments here. Use this thread either with useful information or updates.[/quote]
Thank you. I was about to post and rage that everyone is fighting while a man is missing.

Read full topic

A few days ago I posted in this thread about a missing dog and it was deleted for some reason… These mods here need to give me a warning so I can see who is deleting shit.

Do you really need to be told the reason?

Dogs are important as well, should I post a new thread with the missing dog or can I not use yours?
[/quote]

Actually this forum has a very dense userbase in Florida[/quote]you just totally reminded me of that mopar state thread I/and I had somebody else take over. Whatever happened to it?

item.title: Missing US Navy Chief Petty Officer [Updated] [7-15-13]
item.dc:creator: @stewie0888 stewie0888
item.description:
@stewie0888 wrote:

[center]
[size=24pt]Still Missing as of 7/15/13[/size]

Hello, I ask that you take a minute to look at this and pass it along to others via Facebook, Twitter, etc. I know this isn’t the best place for something like this but everything helps.

ABC News

Video: Navy Recruiter Vanishes in Florida

Kevin Williams was last seen by his wife in a Jacksonville mall parking lot.

WOKV Radio

Search continues for missing Navy man | Depend On WOKV - Jacksonville's News,...

Jacksonville Police are continuing to ask for the public's help locating a Navy man last seen this past Tuesday afternoon.

http://www.navycs.com/blogs/2013/06/02/a-chief-petty-officer-is-missing

http://abcnews.go.com/US/kevin-williams-florida-navy-officer-missing-12-days/story?id=19358910

http://www.digtriad.com/news/article/287846/1/Navy-Chief-Kevin-Williams-Missing-From-Jacksonville-FL-Since-May-28

http://foxnewsinsider.com/2013/06/10/kevin-williams-florida-navy-officer-missing-after-getting-fight-wife

WJXT – 29 Jun 13

Family, friends of missing sailor join for candlelight vigil

Friends and family of Chief Petty Officer Kevin Williams gathered during a candlelight vigil Friday in Mandarin.

Chief Petty Officer Kevin Williams, US Navy went missing at approximately 1420(2:20pm) on May 28th 2013.
He was last seen by his wife at Avenues Mall in Jacksonville Florida. He was wearing the Navy Working Uniform (The blue digital camouflage seen in the picture).
If you have any information please contact the police or NRD Jacksonville Command Duty Officer @ 904.524.3723

Bigger Image: http://i.imgur.com/l7BavpO.jpg

I created this image for easy sharing

To any of you who are Americans or live in the United States, kindly show some support for a man who has dedicated himself to serving you, and your country.

Everything helps, Thank-you.

Read full topic
